# Summary

The United States National Highway Traffic Safety Administration provides a dataset of over 27,000 recalls recorded in the US from 1966 to 2024. I will be using this data to illustrate EDA Essentials as a data scientist.

Source: https://datahub.transportation.gov/Automobiles/Recalls-Data/6axg-epim/about_data
